name: Clipboard Manager
description: A version of the Sublime Text plugin at <http://www.sublimetext.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=2260&start=0> that makes for TextMate-like clipboard history.  Based on Clipboard History, by AJ Palkovic (ajpalkovic) and Martin Aspeli (optilude)
author: Colin T.A. Gray (colinta)
